text.p: Here are the main headlines from Lithuania's M-1 Plus radio station's noon news report on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- President Algirdas Brazauskas will attend a reception in Madrid hosted by U.S. President Bill Clinton. He will also meet with his other Baltic counterparts and the leaders of Poland, Hungary and the Czech Republic.
- Conservative Party MP Rasa Rastauskiene said she fears that the work of parliament in autumn might be hindered by the December presidential election.
- The leaders of municipalities said they are worried by the delays in transfering the assets of Lithuanian Energy to their control.
